data.actual_result: Discord closes out of both profiles but then crashes, giving you the crash screen
data.expected_result: Discord successfully closes out of both profiles
data.short_description: Discord occasionally crashes after loading two mutual friends lists and then closing out of both profiles
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your friend's list and open the user profile of someone you share mutual friends with - Open the mutual friends page and go to another user profile that you also share mutual friends with - Open the mutual friends page on the second user profile - Close out of both profiles - Does not happen every time, so try multiple times
